title: TIMEOUT something unusual keeps happening!

embed.description: Gyazo is a simple way to share screenshots, GIFs, and replays in seconds. Take interesting and useful captures from games, apps, and sites instantly.

body:
ive been having this client bug for the past few days. whenever i login to the alpha client it will load for a while then produce this message
ive tried deleting the "riot client" folder, which allows me to log into league directly one time however if i wish to log in again i must delete this folder once more
this however does NOT help me to log into legends of runeterra which requires the alpha client.
if i try to uninstall after a failed login attempt it prevents me and says the program is already running, which task manager says it is not.
other things i have tried:
1. initiate full repair after logging in directly (deleting riot client folder) this brins up the alpha client login screen and the bug persists
2. hextech repair tool reinstall (no effect)
3. hextech repair tool clean reinstall (no effect)
4. completely removing and deleting all files, fresh download and install from league homepage (no effect)
5. running as administrator (this gets me passed first loading screen on legends of runeterra, but then proceeds into the timeout bug)
6. CCleaner as suggested in FAQ (no effect)
7. full repair through client after loggin in directly. brings up alpha client once again, bug persists

normally id just delete the riot client folder and log into league directly until a patch or something fixes the issue but i want to play legends of runeterra when its reopened, ive looked everywhere on how to uninstall/repair only the alpha client or how to fix this issue but all ive seen are "run as administrator" or "fresh reinstall" which have not worked for me

please someone help me ive run out of options

EDIT: only thing i can currently think of is something in the last patch changed in the alpha client and my antivirus doesnt like it, going to mess around with it for a bit (seems unlikely since i havent seen 500 of these posts)

EDIT2: firewall and antivirus are not interfering with riot alpha client. also if i try a fresh reinstall of league without the "riot client" folder being deleted, it brings up the alpha client login screen and bug persists WITHOUT starting the install (same deal if i try to uninstall, brings up login screen then bug)

replies.body: been over 2 months now, no change yet still cant log in

love how riot doesn't even try to help 
{{sticker:sg-shisa}}
its been over a month and this is still happening. would love some suggestions{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
